primary.description: Earth Green - Structural elements, success states, borders

secondary.description: Vitamin Orange - Primary CTAs, urgent notifications, energy accents

accent.description: Fresh Lime - Highlights, progress bars, active states

background.description: Pure White for cleanliness, Warm Off-White for sections

styles.h1: font-heading text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none
styles.label: font-body text-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay on solid green backgrounds to avoid flat 'tech' look.
visual_enhancers.shapes: Use organic blobs in background with opacity-20 for 'Freshness' vibe.

buttons.primary: bg-secondary hover:bg-secondary/90 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold shadow-button transform hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-muted-foreground hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium

cards.feature: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 border border-border/50 shadow-card hover:border-primary/20 transition-all group
cards.plan: bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-orange-50 rounded-3xl p-8 border-2 border-transparent hover:border-secondary transition-all relative overflow-hidden

inputs.text: h-14 bg-background border-2 border-input focus:border-primary rounded-xl px-6 text-lg transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50
inputs.select: h-14 bg-background border-2 border-input focus:border-primary rounded-xl px-6 text-lg

feedback.success: bg-primary/10 text-primary border border-primary/20 rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center gap-3
feedback.error: bg-red-50 text-red-600 border border-red-100 rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center gap-3

hero.headline_style: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-heading font-extrabold tracking-tight text-foreground
hero.highlight_text: Use 'text_highlight' gradient for key phrases like 'Mejor Versi√≥n' or 'Comer Rico'
hero.cta_button: Large Pill Button with ArrowRight icon

features.layout: Grid of 3 cards with oversized icons and vibrant hover states

questionnaire.option_cards: Grid-cols-2, aspect-square selection cards with icons. Active state: ring-4 ring-primary bg-primary/5

do_not: Use sharp 90deg corners (always rounded-xl or more)
Use dark mode by default (Force Light Mode)
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text on Orange background is White or Black depending on APCA score. Generally White on #FF7F2A is acceptable for large text, but risky for small text.
universal_guidelines.localization: All text MUST be in Spanish. Currency format: $MXN or general $ symbol.

instructions_to_main_agent: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (primary, secondary, accent) and fonts.
Import fonts 'Outfit' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css.
For the Questionnaire, build a multi-step form using a state manager or simple React state.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and dashboard placeholders.
Ensure the 'Pill' button shape is consistent across the app.
